data.description:
Introducing the world’s most anticipated and first licensed WORLD SUPERBIKE CHAMPIONSHIP VR Racing Game!

Step into the heart-pounding world of VRIDER: the official game of the WSBK, passionately designed because we believe MOTORCYCLE RACING IS FOR EVERYONE!
{1084792995923895}
Throttle up to speeds over 200 mph (320 km/h), compete with riders globally, and truly immerse yourself in this multi-sensorial multiplayer VR thrill! 

VRIDER has pushed the boundaries of what’s possible with META’s Quest, bringing a realistic and insanely fun racing game to VR. 
{306569895842310}
Feel the engine's roar with Spatial Audio, the wind's rush, and the thunder of superbikes, transporting you straight to the track.

Experience head-to-head on-track battles against AI, real-life opponents, or against the clock. Will you lead the global leaderboard?
{1136846277372791}
Immerse yourself in the ultimate adrenaline-pumping racing experience with our unique control system & remember: RACE ON THE EDGE!

Features:
- Online Multiplayer with global leaderboards!
- Choose your racing profile: rookie, intermediate, expert, or pro.
- Racing modes include Quick Race, Track Trial, Tournament, Ghost Challenge, Endurance, and Hot Lap.
- 12 licensed circuits, plus 23 official riders from the WSBK. 
- 5 Official Superbikes: Ducati Panigale V4 R, BMW S100RR, Kawasaki Ninja ZX 10RR, Honda CBR1000RR, Yamaha YZF R1.
- New tutorials include auto-brake, advanced controls, AI tuning, and more!
- MotionWellness™ Technology (Beta) allows playability & comfort for all.

changelog.change_log:
NEW Free Practice Mode: The much-awaited “Free Practice” mode is here! Hone your lap times while waiting for friends and other players to join your race. Get ready to dominate the track!

NEW Multiplayer Game Mode: Casual Races: Race globally with players from around the world in our new Casual Race mode. Enjoy a relaxed ping filter and no collisions. It’s all about the fun!

Competitive Races: Realtime MP Races are now called “Competitive Races”. This mode features collisions and region-based servers for the ultimate competitive experience.

Changelist:

- Spectator Mode with multiple cameras, auto follow & race info
- Accessibility feature: drag reduction mechanics can now be controlled via button press if enabled in the accessibility menu
- Improved Tutorial Flow
- Ghost Challenge game mode improvements
- Camera Shake “low intensity” option added
- UX improvements
- Various bug fixes

A new version just landed, make sure to update VRider SBK to keep accessing MP Races!

- Quest 3 Graphics optimisations

- Added Steering and Throttle Sensitivity options

- Added left trigger braking for Twist to Throttle controls

- Realtime MP optimisations

- Intro Video with basic game instructions

- Various bug fixes
